title: Pink Floyd - The Final Cut (expanded by }{eywood)
description:
This is the new remaster of TFC that includes When The Tigers Broke Free. The problem I had with this is that they didn't include the final verse of The Hero's Return (still not available on CD). I therefore took it upon myself to add it to the sequencing. Because of the connecting soundscapes and overlapping music I could not put it exactly where it belongs in the running order (after The Gunner's Dream), instead sticking it between the album sides. I've also included the single versions of a couple of songs as extras.

01 The Post War Dream
02 Your Possible Pasts
03 One Of The Few
04 When the Tigers Broke Free
05 The Hero's Return Part 1
06 The Gunner's Dream
07 Paranoid Eyes
08 The Hero's Return Part 2
09 Get Your Filthy Hands Off My Desert
10 The Fletcher Memorial Home
11 Southampton Dock
12 The Final Cut
13 Not Now John
14 Two Suns in the Sunset

Bonus:

15 The Final Cut radio advert
16 Not Now John (obscured version)
17 Not Now John (edit)
18 The Hero's Return Parts 1 & 2
